title: Moloco Cloud Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the Moloco Cloud adapter

placementtype.description: A string defining the placement type from Moloco Cloud

region.description: A string defining region for choosing the closest Moloco Cloud endpoint

skadn_supported.description: A bool config to determine if SKAN is supported by Moloco Cloud

mraid_supported.description: A bool config to determine if MRAID is supported by Moloco Cloud
